author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...RISK OF LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING CONTINUES FOR BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR AND SOUTHWESTERN SONORA...
summary: ...RISK OF LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODING CONTINUES FOR BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR AND SOUTHWESTERN SONORA... As of 11:00 AM MST Thu Sep 04 the center of Lorena was located near 24.4, -114.5 with movement NW at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 997 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

As of 11:00 AM MST Thu Sep 04 the center of Lorena was located near 24.4, -114.5 with movement NW at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 997 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Lorena (EP2/EP122025)
